description.title: Description
description.lead: Bubble World is a game for children to learn about the worlds.

startMenu.title: Start Menu
startMenu.intro: Opening the app and start menu
startMenu.caption: Start menu
items: Launch the app from the home screen

sound.title: Sound Settings
sound.caption: Adjust Music / SFX / VO levels
sound.p: Use the sliders to adjust volume levels.

intro.title: Intro
intro.caption: Welcome to the world
intro.p: Your journey begins in the village...

steering.title: Controls
steering.caption: How to move
steering.p1: Use the left stick to move.
steering.p2: Press Jump to hop over obstacles.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.caption: Quests and missions
tasks.savingExample: Progress is saved after each completed task.

lighter.title: Lighter
lighter.caption: Light your way
lighter.p: Use the lighter to see in dark places.

fixing.title: Fixing Items
fixing.caption: Repair broken objects
fixing.p: Collect parts to repair items and restore meaning.

buying.title: Buying
buying.caption: Spend coins wisely
buying.p: Visit shops to buy helpful items.
